title: Very Casual Team LF 2 Members. (Preferably Silver+)
body:
Pretty much title says it all, We are just a group of real life friends who play 3s weekly but are looking to expand to Summoners Rift. We don't plan on playing every night nor do we want to so don't expect for this team to have set days/hours we play, Just be able to play when we want to. 

We are looking for either a duo (Bot Lane) or just two separate players for Marksman and Support (Willing to negotiate roles).

If you are interested please post bellow or just send me an add in game and let me know, We are probably looking at playing this weekend.

replies.body: hey im a casual and i think im perfect for this i can play either adc or support and my current rank is plat5
diamond adc, mainly play nights just looking for semi casual nothing to serious
We will be playing Games today through till tonight if anyone is interested..
I'm  an adc. Was gold5 and climbing in preseason but still currently s4, haven't been on ranked till now
